A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'd like to find this \"critics\" who give a 93% fresh rating and wipe their face in the pile of crap I just watched.  It's like Rian Johnson took my childhood and wiped his ass with it.  I can't trust Rotten Tomatoes anymore after this wildly divergent representation of the truth.  The movie the critics claim to have seen is NOT the movie everyone else saw.
